segment.source: Common questions about ad campaigns
segment.target: Common questions about ad campaigns

segment.source: Common questions about ad campaigns
segment.target: Common questions about ad campaigns

segment.source: Common questions about ad campaigns
segment.target: Common questions about ad campaigns

segment.source: How much does it cost to run an ad for my app?
segment.target: How much does it cost to run an ad for my app?

segment.source: It’s really up to you, but remember: the more you spend, the more people will see your ad.
segment.target: It’s really up to you, but remember: the more you spend, the more people will see your ad.

segment.source: The more people see your ad, the more clicks and installs you should get.
segment.target: The more people see your ad, the more clicks and installs you should get.

segment.source: Take a look at this article for information on creating an ad campaign for your app.
segment.target: Take a look at this article for information on creating an ad campaign for your app.

segment.source: Can I run ads for one of my apps in my other apps?
segment.target: Can I run ads for one of my apps in my other apps?

segment.source: Yes.
segment.target: Yes.

segment.source: We call these house ads, and you can run them free of charge.
segment.target: We call these house ads, and you can run them free of charge.

segment.source: Check out this article for more information on house ads.
segment.target: Check out this article for more information on house ads.

segment.source: How can I customize my ad?
segment.target: How can I customize my ad?

segment.source: If you use one of the default ad templates, you can choose the size, imagery, and background color of your ad.
segment.target: If you use one of the default ad templates, you can choose the size, imagery, and background color of your ad.

segment.source: You can also add a custom tag line to your ad if you want.
segment.target: You can also add a custom tag line to your ad if you want.

segment.source: Alternatively, you can upload your own ad designs that meet our requirements.
segment.target: Alternatively, you can upload your own ad designs that meet our requirements.

segment.source: For more information, see Create an ad campaign for your app.
segment.target: For more information, see Create an ad campaign for your app.

segment.source: Where will my ad appear?
segment.target: Where will my ad appear?

segment.source: Your ad will appear in apps that share your app's age rating and OS version.
segment.target: Your ad will appear in apps that share your app's age rating and OS version.

segment.source: You set these properties when you publish your app in the Windows Store.
segment.target: You set these properties when you publish your app in the Windows Store.

segment.source: Ad campaigns are currently supported in these countries and regions:
segment.target: Ad campaigns are currently supported in these countries and regions:

segment.source: Algeria, Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bahamas, Bahrain, Barbados, Belgium, Belize, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Finland, France, Germany, Guatemala, Haiti, Honduras, Hong Kong SAR, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Ireland, Italy, Jamaica, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Malaysia, Mexico, Morocco, New Zealand, Netherlands, Nicaragua, Norway, Oman, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Spain, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay, Venezuela, Vietnam.
segment.target: Algeria, Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bahamas, Bahrain, Barbados, Belgium, Belize, Bolivia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, China, Colombia, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, Egypt, El Salvador, Finland, France, Germany, Guatemala, Haiti, Honduras, Hong Kong SAR, India, Indonesia, Iraq, Ireland, Italy, Jamaica, Jordan, Kuwait, Lebanon, Malaysia, Mexico, Morocco, New Zealand, Netherlands, Nicaragua, Norway, Oman, Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Philippines, Puerto Rico, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Spain, South Africa, Sweden, Switzerland, Taiwan, Thailand, Trinidad and Tobago, Tunisia, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, Uruguay, Venezuela, Vietnam.

segment.source: What languages are supported for ad campaigns?
segment.target: What languages are supported for ad campaigns?

segment.source: You can create ad campaigns in the following languages:
segment.target: You can create ad campaigns in the following languages:

segment.source: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Spanish, Swedish.
segment.target: Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese (Brazil), Portuguese (Portugal), Spanish, Swedish.

segment.source: When will I be billed?
segment.target: When will I be billed?

segment.source: You will be billed for any given month early in the following month.
segment.target: You will be billed for any given month early in the following month.

segment.source: How do I delete a credit card or edit the details of a credit card?
segment.target: How do I delete a credit card or edit the details of a credit card?

segment.source: Go to http://commerce.microsoft.com, log in with your Microsoft account credentials, and make the necessary changes.
segment.target: Go to http://commerce.microsoft.com, log in with your Microsoft account credentials, and make the necessary changes.

segment.target: Related topics
